item.title: ELECTRONIC ARTS INC 10-K
item.description: ELECTRONIC ARTS INC, which is in the Services-Prepackaged Software [7372] industry, SEC 10-K filing on May 25, 2022 had 30693 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: revenue - 270 instances net - 262 instances services - 255 instances year - 238 instances fiscal - 225 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
